<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Messenger's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3096)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 292 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This silver signet ring changes to match the insignia of a leader or organization you serve (or your own face, if you serve no one else). It grants you a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks and lets you cast [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1598) as an arcane innate spell at will. 

**Activate—Dispatch Messenger** <actions string="" /> 1 minute ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The ring casts animal messenger to your specification. The animal is a magical creature that springs from the ring, and its appearance suits the iconography or heraldry of the leader or organization represented by the ring.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

>
Messenger's Ring (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 292 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 613 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 13,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ring grants a +3 bonus and can be activated in an additional way. 

**Activate—Sending** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** The ring casts [_sending_](/Spells.aspx?ID=272) to your specifications.
